questions.question: When is ChicTech?
questions.answer: ChicTech will be held on Saturday, October 7th from 9 AM - 5 PM CST!

questions.question: Will ChicTech be in person this year?
questions.answer: ChicTech will be held in person and online! To encourage students from other states and international schools to join, ChicTech will be hybrid.

questions.question: How do I register?
questions.answer: Registration will be open until September 30th. All attending participants will receive an email with detailed information by October 1st. The registration form is here: https://forms.gle/PXVtmDk1UXKr7NA69.

questions.question: Do I need to have prior programming experience?
questions.answer: No! Our goal is to teach you everything you need to know in the workshops regardless of your background knowledge in programming or computer science! We encourage students of all skill levels to join ChicTech.

questions.question: I am not a high school student, can I still attend?
questions.answer: Yes! As long as you are a student between the grades of K - 12, you can register to attend. Our goal is to create a fun experience for everyone and help you build a project that you can be proud of.

questions.question: Are there costs to attending?
questions.answer: No! Once you have registered, that is all you have to do. There are no costs associated with being part of our event.

questions.question: I am attending online, how can I join the zoom sessions?
questions.answer: We will be providing more information as the date of the event approaches and will be posting the Zoom information on this website as well!

questions.question: I have other questions or concerns. How can I reach you?
questions.answer: If you have any questions, feel free to contact atiwari5@illinois.edu, garimas2@illinois.edu, or illinoiswcs.outreach@gmail.com!
